title: F35 Mini-Ep 17: Workplace Fashion and Lunchtime Self-Care
itunes:title: F35 Mini-Ep 17: Workplace Fashion and Lunchtime Self-Care
itunes:subtitle: In this week’s mini-episode, Kate and Doree answer a listener's question about feeling too dressed up for a new workplace and how to get over the sadness of a bad salon visit. Then they hear all about two best friends who just ha...
description:
In this week’s mini-episode, Kate and Doree answer a listener's question about feeling too dressed up for a new workplace and how to get over the sadness of a bad salon visit. Then they hear all about two best friends who just had a Forever35-themed self-care weekend and a group of listeners who started Self-Care Friday during their lunch hour at work. Kate and Doree give lots of great tips for lunchtime care, including the exciting new idea of a Gratitude Exchange.

To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. To learn more, visit forever35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Milk and Honey. Natural makeup, skincare, and fragrance. For 25% off your first order, go to MilkandHoney.com and enter the code Forever25 at checkout.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
